      • retrieveABids

        public Bid retrieveABids(java.lang.String userID,
                         java.lang.String courseID,
                         java.lang.String sectionID,
                         int round)
        Parameters:
        userID - Current user - userID. E.g. amy.tan.2009
        courseID - Current course - courseID. E.g. IS101
        sectionID - Current section - sectionID. E.g. S1
        round - Current Round. E.g. 1
        Returns:
        current Bid object with the specified details, if Bid does not exist, return null exist, return null

      • generateBidsRound

        public void generateBidsRound(java.util.ArrayList<Bid> allBidsForASection,
                              Section section,
                              int round)
        Generate the Bid Round If vacancy of the section is more than the number of bids, automatically adds all the bids to the section minimum clearing price is set based on the number of vacancies, i.e. if the class has 35 vacancies, the 35th highest bid is the clearing price. If there is only one bid at the clearing price, it will be successful. Otherwise, all bids at the clearing price will be dropped regardless of whether they can technically all be accommodated
        Parameters:
        allBidsForASection - List of Bids For A Section
        section - Current section object
        round - Current round

      • calculateMinBid

        public double calculateMinBid(Section section)
        calculates the minimum bid based on the section code
        Parameters:
        section - Current section object
        Returns:
        the minimum bid amount

      • stillInRange

        public boolean stillInRange(Bid studentBid,
                            Section toCheck)
        Takes in a student Bid object and Section code, returns true if Student's Bid amount is above the clearing price, returns false otherwise generateBids
        Parameters:
        studentBid - pass in studentBid
        toCheck - Current Section to check
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise
